content.title: The Knuckleball
content.intro_hook: Master the technique of Ronaldo & Bale.

core_concept.explanation: A knuckleball is a shot with zero spin, causing the ball to move erratically in the air due to the airflow.
core_concept.analogy: Like a baseball pitcher throwing a knuckleball.

vocabulary_rich.meaning: The ball does not rotate in the air.
The hardest part of the ball, often the target for impact.
To move unsteadily from side to side.

questions.scenario: Watch the impact. Where does he strike the ball to stop the spin?

options.feedback: Spot on! Hitting the valve gives maximum power and zero spin.
No, that would create a curve (curl), not a knuckle.
